catalog_script_client.name: switch to catalog view

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_12a314a1979871106cf971371153af02
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Application Discovery">19f2dc69971871106cf971371153af91</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>switch to catalog view</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   //If the page isn't loading
   if(!isLoading){
      //If the new value isn't blank
      if(newValue != ''){
         //Change to the 'cataloq' view if the Category is 'MSIX Builder'
         if(newValue == 'MSIX Builder'){
            switchView('section','sc_req_item','catalog');
         }
      }
   }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-27 11:49:01</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>12a314a1979871106cf971371153af02</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>switch to catalog view</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Capture" source="x_685788_test2">67338c24272ea510724cb0b5c1519811</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Capture">67338c24272ea510724cb0b5c1519811</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_12a314a1979871106cf971371153af02</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-27 11:54:13</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
